SceneDescription.name: Endgame
SceneDescription.description:
Assassin: "I have an explanation if you will hear me out, Sir..."
Lord Borkus: "Speak quickly."
Assassin: "The maid staff were…extremely angry after the meeting this morning. They decided to go on strike and began to destroy your mansion. I did what I could to stop them and clean up their messes, but it was too much for me to handle alone. I deeply apologize, Sir."
Lord Borkus looks drastically less happy than before.
Lord Borkus: "Why did you not inform me that these things were happening?!"
Assassin: "I didn’t want to disturb you, Sir. "
